snippet: The attacker escaped after opening fire on coalition soldiers in remote eastern Afghanistan on Friday, officials said.
abstract: Gunman wearing Afghan Army uniform opens fire on American soldiers in Afghanistan, killing one before escaping, in what appears to be another in string of assaults on coalition soldiers by their Afghan partners; killings are raising tensions and complicating NATO's efforts to train Afghan soldiers and eventually withdraw Western forces from the country.

byline.contributor: Employees of The New York Times contributed reporting from Kunar, Helmand and Kunduz Provinces.

lead_paragraph: The attacker escaped after opening fire on coalition soldiers in remote eastern Afghanistan on Friday, officials said.
